timeline.message: Add remaining properties to SAML provider config.
Add comment describing why 'suppressLoadErrors' needs to be set.

timeline.bodyText: I was told we are not ready to expose this just yet. Let's remove it from this iteration.
timeline.author: hiranya911

replies.bodyText: I'm a little confused. This is already exposed in the Go API and the Node API. Is signRequest going to be removed from those APIs as well? Or are the APIs going to be inconsistent with one another?
replies.author: micahstairs

replies.bodyText: They will be inconsistent for now. SignRequest is not ready to be exposed yet. Node and Go have jumped the line.
replies.author: hiranya911

replies.bodyText: Alright, just wanted to make sure!
replies.author: micahstairs

timeline.message: Remove request signing from SAML API.
